variable.name: Individual_ID
variable.description: Subject Identifier

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: CONTACT OCCASION
variable.comment: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time.

variable.name: AF2V1
variable.description: 1. In uncertain times I expect the best.
variable.comment: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time.

variable.name: AF2V2
variable.description: 2. If something can go wrong for me, it will.
variable.comment: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time.

variable.name: AF2V3
variable.description: 3. I'm always optimistic about my future.
variable.comment: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time.

variable.name: AF2V4
variable.description: 4. I hardly ever expect things to go my way.
variable.comment: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time.

variable.name: AF2V5
variable.description: 5. I rarely count on good things happening to me.
variable.comment: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time.

variable.name: AF2V6
variable.description: 6. Overall, I expect more good things to happen than bad.
variable.comment: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time.

variable.name: AF2V7
variable.description: 7. Please tell me which of the following best describes your employment status?
variable.comment: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time.

variable.name: AF2V8
variable.description: 8. Have you worked for pay in the past?

variable.name: AF2V9
variable.description: 9. How satisfied (are/were) you with your job?
variable.comment: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time.

variable.name: AF2V10
variable.description: 10. During the past year, how often were you in a situation where you faced job loss or layoff?
variable.comment: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time.

variable.name: AF2V11
variable.description: 11. Sometimes people have jobs that they want to keep. When thinking about your job (now/when you were working),
variable.comment: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time.

variable.name: AF2V12
variable.description: 12. If you were to lose your main job, what do you think your chances of finding another job that paid about the same?
variable.comment: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time.

variable.name: AF2V13
variable.description: 13. I (have/had) very little chance to decide how I do my work.
variable.comment: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time.

variable.name: AF2V14
variable.description: 14. My work (requires/required) working very fast.
variable.comment: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time.

variable.name: AF2V15
variable.description: 15. My work (requires/required) a lot of physical effort.
variable.comment: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time.

variable.name: AF2V16
variable.description: 16. I (have/had) enough time to get my work done.
variable.comment: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time.

variable.name: AF2V17
variable.description: 17. I (get/got) to do a variety of different things.
variable.comment: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time.

variable.name: AF2V18
variable.description: 18. At your workplace, (do/did) you participate in making decisions about such things as the products or services offered?

variable.name: AF2V19A
variable.description: 19a. As an official part of your job, (do/did) you supervise work of other employees, or tell other employees what work to do?

variable.name: AF2V19B
variable.description: 19b. (Do/Did) you hold a managerial position at your place of employment?

variable.name: AF2V19C
variable.description: 19c. Would that (be/have been) a top, upper, middle or lower managerial position?
variable.comment: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time.

variable.name: AF2V20
variable.description: 20. (Does/Did) someone else supervise your work?

variable.name: AF2V21
variable.description: 21. (Is/Was) your immediate supervisor Black, White, or of another ethnicity or race?
variable.comment: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time.

variable.name: AF2V22
variable.description: 22. Do you think your job (is/was) one that Black people tend to get more than people of other ethnic groups?

variable.name: AF2V23
variable.description: 23. (Is/Was) your work group all Black, mostly Black, about half Black and half White, mostly White, or all White?
variable.comment: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time.
